name: Dolby.io App Builder Demo
description: This is the app builder demo app for Dolby.io

CONSUMER_KEY.description: Go to your dashboard and for the first application, get your Consumer Key https://dashboard.dolby.io/dashboard/applications/summary

CONSUMER_SECRET.description: Go to your dashboard and for the first application, get your Consumer Key and Consumer Secret https://dashboard.dolby.io/dashboard/applications/summary
